title: Bug 32286: ControlExample Button Tab changing styles resets button orientation
description: Bug 32286 ControlExample Button Tab changing styles resets button orientation. Ensure that Eclipse is not running. Accept new configuration defaults.
OB: When using the Button controls from the SWT Controls example, if SWT.ARROW buttons are used and SWT.BORDER property is selected or deselected, the arrow alignment property of all the arrow buttons is reset to UP.
EB: The arrow buttons should retain their orientation when the SWT.BORDER property is selected or deselected.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open SWT Controls view. 
2. Select or deselect SWT.BORDER in the styles group. 
3. Observe that the arrow buttons change their orientation. 
4. Observe that the arrow buttons change their orientation back to 'up'.
